info.name: Remove Outlook.com Ad bar and Reclaim Space
info.description:
Hide the right advertisement bar of Outlook.com (live.com), and give the space to mail list part.

Updated to support the new Outlook.com layout.
info.additionalInfo: Outlook.com is a very beautiful and clean product from Microsoft and I like it. please just use the script to block the ad when you get really annoying ad items and you are using a device whose screen is too small for the ad.
